text: “Ndipo pamene buku lidawadzera (m’nyengo ya mtumiki Muhammad {s.a.w}) lochokera kwa Allah, loikira umboni zomwe zili pamodzi ndi iwo (adalikana), pomwe kale (lisadadze bukulo) adali kupempha chithandizo (kupyolera kwa mtumiki wolonjezedwa) chogonjetsera amene sadakhulupirire. Koma pamene chidawadzera chimene adachidziwa, (Qur’an) adachikana. Choncho matembelero a Allah ali pa osakhulupirira
